trans-unit.note: Go back
Refers to the installed version. For example: "Release Version: 1.23"

trans-unit.source: A fast, secure and easy to use VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Malsny, wěsty a lažko wužywajobny VPN. Wót wuwijarjow Firefox wuwity.

trans-unit.note: Refers to the installed version. For example: "Release Version: 1.23"
The abbreviation for Internet Protocol. This is followed by the user’s IPv4 address.
The abbreviation for Internet Protocol. This is followed by the user’s IP address.
The abbreviation for Internet Procol version 6. This is followed by the user’s IPv6 address.
The current download speed. The speed is shown on the next line.
The current upload speed. The speed is shown on the next line.
The abbreviation for Internet Protocol. This is followed by the user’s IP address.
This refers to the user’s internet connection.
Message displayed to the user when the connection is unstable or missing, asking them to check their connection.

trans-unit.source: Turn on to protect your privacy
trans-unit.target: Zmóžniśo jen, aby swóju priwatnosć šćitał

trans-unit.note: This refers to the user’s internet connection.
Switches from location 1 to location 2
Example: "deviceName deviceDescription"

trans-unit.source: Added less than an hour ago
trans-unit.target: Pśed mjenjej ako jadneju góźinu pśidany

trans-unit.note: %1 is the number of hours.
%1 is the number of days. Note: there is currently no support for proper plurals
Label used for accessibility on the button to remove a device. %1 is the name of the device.

trans-unit.source: You’ve reached the device limit. To turn on the VPN on this device, you’ll need to remove one.
trans-unit.target: Sćo dojśpił rědowy limit. Aby VPN na toś tom rěźe zmóžnił, musyśo jaden z nich wótwónoźeś.

trans-unit.note: Bytes per second
Kilobytes per second
Megabytes per second
Gigabytes per second
Terabytes per second
Used as accessibility description for the connection info: %1 is the localized label for “Upload” or “Download”, %2 is the speed value, %3 is the localized unit. Example: “Upload: 10 Mbps”.

trans-unit.source: Please confirm you would like to remove %1.
trans-unit.note: %1 is the name of the device being removed. The name is displayed on purpose on a new line.
This is the “remove” device button.
The title for the list of cities.
“/month” stands for “per month”. %1 is replaced by the monthly cost (including currency).
%1 is replaced by the subscription duration in months. %2 is replaced by the total subscription cost.
Appears on the in-app purchase view beside a subscription plan. "%1" is replaced by the percentage amount saved when selecting that plan.
Restore a service in case of error.

trans-unit.source: Operation not allowed from current location
trans-unit.target: Operacija njejo dowólona wót aktualnego městna
Pśez Mozilla VPN šćitany DNS awtomatiski wužywaś

trans-unit.source: Resolve website domain names using a DNS in your local network
trans-unit.target: Domenowe mjenja websedłow z pomocu DNS w swójej lokalnej seśi rozwězaś

trans-unit.source: We currently support only IPv4 IP addresses

trans-unit.note: Search bar placeholder text
Button label

trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to edit App Permissions
trans-unit.target: VPN musy znjemóžnjony byś, aby wy mógał nałožeńske pšawa wobźěłaś
trans-unit.note: Associated to a group of settings that require the VPN to be disconnected to change

trans-unit.source: Choose which apps should use the VPN
trans-unit.target: Wubjeŕśo, kótare nałoženja maju VPN wužywaś

trans-unit.source: VPN protects all apps by default
trans-unit.target: VPN pó standarźe wšykne nałoženja šćita

trans-unit.note: Header for the list of apps protected by VPN

trans-unit.source: These apps will use the VPN
trans-unit.target: Toś te nałoženja budu VPN wužywaś
trans-unit.note: Description for the list of apps protected by VPN
Label for the button to remove protection from all apps currently protected.
Header for the list of apps not protected by VPN

trans-unit.source: These apps will not use the VPN
trans-unit.target: Toś te nałoženja njebudu VPN wužywaś
trans-unit.note: Description for the list of apps not protected by VPN
Label for the button to add protection to all apps currently unprotected.

trans-unit.source: VPN protects all apps by default. Turn off to choose which apps Mozilla VPN should not protect.
trans-unit.target: VPN wšykne nałoženja pó standarźe šćita. Znjemóžniśo jen, aby nałoženja wubrał, kótarež Mozilla VPN njama šćitaś.

trans-unit.note: Header for the list of apps protected by VPN

trans-unit.source: How would you describe your Mozilla VPN experience so far?
trans-unit.target: Kak by wy wopisał swóje dotychměstne nazgónjenja z Mozilla VPN?

trans-unit.source: We’re sorry to hear you’ve had a poor experience. Please let us know how we can improve.
trans-unit.target: Jo nam luto, až sćo měł špatne dožywjenje. Pšosym dajśo nam k wěsći, kak móžomy to pólěpšyś.

trans-unit.source: We’d love to know what we can do to improve Mozilla VPN. Please share any specific feedback here.
trans-unit.target: My by rady wěźeli, což móžomy cyniś, aby my Mozilla VPN pólěpšyli. Pšosym dajśo nam how swójo měnjenje k wěsći.

trans-unit.source: When you submit feedback, Mozilla VPN will collect technical and interaction data, including your IP address, to help us improve. This data won’t be associated with your Firefox account.
trans-unit.target: Gaž swójo měnjenje k wěsći dajośo, buźo Mozilla VPN techniske a interakciske daty hromaźiś, mjazy nimi IP-adresu, aby nam pśi pólěpšowanju pomagał. Toś te daty njejsu zwězane z wašym kontom Firefox.

trans-unit.source: We appreciate your feedback. You’re helping us improve Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Źěkujomy se za wašo měnjenje. Pomagajśo nam, Mozilla VPN pólěpšyś.

trans-unit.source: We’d love to know what we can do to improve Mozilla VPN. Please share any specific feedback here.
trans-unit.target: My by rady wěźeli, což móžomy cyniś, aby my Mozilla VPN pólěpšyli. Pšosym dajśo nam how swójo měnjenje k wěsći.

trans-unit.source: We’re glad you’re enjoying Mozilla VPN! Please let us know how we can make your experience even better.
trans-unit.target: Wjaselimy se, až Mozilla VPN wužywaśo! Pšosym dajśo nam k wěsći, kak móžomy wašo dožywjenje pólěpšyś.

trans-unit.note: Title for the language switcher toggle.

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN will use the default system language.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN buźo standardnu rěc wašogo systema wužywaś.
trans-unit.note: Description for the language switcher toggle when "Use system language" is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Disable to select a different language
trans-unit.target: Znjemóžniś, aby wy drugu rěc wubrał
trans-unit.note: Tooltip for the language switcher toggle
This string is read by accessibility tools. %1 is the language name, %2 is the localized language name.

trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to edit these settings
trans-unit.target: VPN musy znjemóžnjony byś, aby wy mógał toś te nastajenja wobźěłaś
trans-unit.note: Associated to a group of settings that require the VPN to be disconnected to change

trans-unit.source: Push the internet forward with the latest version of the Internet Protocol
trans-unit.target: Spórajśo internet z nejnowšeju wersiju internetnego protokola doprědka

trans-unit.source: Access printers, streaming sticks and all other devices on your local network
trans-unit.target: Mějśo pśistup k śišćakam, tšugańskim stickam a wšym drugim rědam w swójej lokalnej seśi

trans-unit.source: Get notified if a guest Wi-Fi portal is blocked due to VPN connection
trans-unit.target: Dostańśo powěźeńku, jolic se góstny WLAN-portal VPN-zwiska dla blokěrujo

trans-unit.source: Get notified if you connect to an unsecured Wi-Fi network
trans-unit.target: Dostańśo powěźeńku, gaž se z njewěsteju WLAN-seśu zwězujośo

trans-unit.source: Get notified when you successfully switched servers
trans-unit.target: Zdźělenje wó wuspěšnej wuměnje serwerow zmóžniś

trans-unit.source: Get notified when the connection status changes
trans-unit.target: Zdźělenje wó statusowych změnjenjach zwiska zmóžniś

trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical data to Mozilla
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN dowóliś, Mozilla techniske daty pósłaś

trans-unit.source: Waiting for sign in and subscription confirmation…
trans-unit.target: Caka se na pśizjawjenje a wobkšuśenje abonementa…

trans-unit.source: Unable to establish a connection at this time. We’re working hard to resolve the issue. Please try again shortly.
trans-unit.target: Tuchylu zwisk njejo móžny. Źěłamy śěžko, aby problem rozwězali. Pšosym wopytajśo skóro hyšći raz.

trans-unit.source: You can quickly access Mozilla VPN from your status bar.
trans-unit.target: Maśo malsny pśistup k Mozilla VPN ze swójeje statusoweje rědki.

trans-unit.source: Another Firefox Account has already subscribed using this Apple ID.
trans-unit.target: Druge konto Firefox jo se južo pśizjawiło z toś tym Apple ID.

trans-unit.source: Visit our help center to learn more about managing your subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Woglědajśo se k našomu centrumoju pomocy, aby wěcej wó tom zgónił, kak móžośo swóje abonementy zastojaś.

trans-unit.source: We strive to provide you with choices and collect only the technical data we need to improve Mozilla VPN. Sharing this data with Mozilla is optional.
trans-unit.target: Procujomy se, wam wólnosć daś a jano techniske daty gromaźiś, kótarež trjebamy, aby Mozilla VPN pólěpšyli. Źělenje toś tych datow z Mozilla jo opcionalne.

trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical data to Mozilla?
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN dowóliś, Mozilla techniske daty pósłaś?

trans-unit.source: Learn more about what data Mozilla collects and how it’s used.
trans-unit.target: Zgóńśo wěcej wó tom, kótare daty Mozilla gromaźi a kak se wužywaju.

trans-unit.source: We strive to provide you with choices and collect only the technical data we need to improve Mozilla VPN. Sharing data with Mozilla is optional.
trans-unit.target: Procujomy se, wam wólnosć daś a jano techniske daty gromaźiś, kótarež trjebamy, aby Mozilla VPN pólěpšyli. Źělenje datow z Mozilla jo opcionalne.

trans-unit.note: Example: You have "x of y" devices in your account, where y is the limit of allowed devices.
Select the Location of the VPN server
Accessibility description for current location of the VPN server

trans-unit.source: Encrypt your traffic so that it can’t be read by your ISP or eavesdroppers.
trans-unit.target: Koděrujśo swój datowy wobchad, až njeby se dał wót wašogo internetnego póbitowarja abo wótsłucharjow cytaś.

trans-unit.note: The + after the number stands for “more than”. If you change the number of countries here, please update ViewSubscriptionNeeded.qml too.

trans-unit.source: Pick a server in any country you want and hide your location to throw off trackers.
trans-unit.target: Wubjeŕśo serwer w někakimžkuli kraju a schowajśo swójo stojnišćo, aby pśeslědowaki wótśesł.

trans-unit.source: Stream, download, and game without limits, monthly caps or ISP throttling.
trans-unit.target: Móžośo bźez limitow, mjasečnych granciow abo droslowanja wót internetnego póbitowarja tšugaś, ześěgnuś a graś.

trans-unit.source: We are committed to not monitoring or logging your browsing or network history.
trans-unit.target: Zawězujomy se, až wašu pśeglědowańsku abo seśowu historiju njedoglědujomy abo njeprotokolěrujomy.

trans-unit.note: %1 is the number of devices. Note: there is currently no support for proper plurals
“/mo” stands for “per month”. %1 is replaced by the cost (including currency).

trans-unit.source: Protect your access to the web.
We’re Mozilla. We’re on your side.
trans-unit.target: My smy Mozilla. Smy na wašom boku.

trans-unit.source: Please update the app before you continue to use the VPN
trans-unit.target: Pšosym aktualizěrujśo nałoženje, nježli až VPN dalej wužywaśo

trans-unit.source: We detected and fixed a serious bug. You must update your app.
trans-unit.target: Smy wótekšyli a pórěźili rozwažnu zmólku. Musyśo swójo nałoženje aktualizěrowaś.

trans-unit.source: Your connection will not be secure while you update.
trans-unit.target: Waš zwisk njejo wěsty, daniž njeaktualizěrujośo.

trans-unit.note: This refers to the current IP address, i.e. "IP: Loading".

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN requires Mac OS X 10.6 or later.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN se Mac OS X 10.6 abo nowše pomina.

trans-unit.source: A previous installation of Mozilla VPN exists at /Applications/Mozilla VPN.app. This installer will remove the previous installation prior to installing. Please back up any data before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: W /Applications/Mozilla VPN.app pjerwjejšna instalacija Mozilla VPN eksistěrujo. Toś ten instalěrowański program pjerwjejšnu instalaciju pśed instalowanim wótwónoźijo. Pšosym zawěsććo daty, nježli až pókšacujośo.

trans-unit.source: You will now be guided through the installation steps for the Mozilla VPN. Thank you for choosing your VPN from the trusted pioneer of internet privacy.
trans-unit.target: Wjadu was něnto pśez instalaciske kšace za Mozilla VPN. Wjeliki źěk, až sćo se rozsuźił za VPN wót dowěry gódnego pioněra internetneje priwatnosći.
Klikniśo na „Dalej“, aby z konfiguraciju pókšacował.

trans-unit.source: The Mozilla VPN is successfully installed. Go to your Applications folder to open up the VPN and start taking control of your online privacy.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN jo se wuspěšnje zainstalěrował. Źiśo k swójomu zarědnikoju nałoženjow, aby VPN startował a kontrolu nad swójeju priwatnosću online pśewzeł.

trans-unit.note: Shown as message body in a notification. %1 and %3 are countries, %2 and %4 are cities.
Shown as message body in a notification. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.
Shown as message body in a notification. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.
Refers to the app - which is currently running the background and waiting
Location in the systray. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.

trans-unit.source: %1 is not secure. Click here to turn on VPN and secure your device.
trans-unit.target: %1 njejo wěsta. Klikniśo how, aby VPN zmóžnił a swój rěd zawěsćił.
trans-unit.note: %1 is the Wi-Fi network name

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to requires action. Click here to turn off VPN to see the portal.
trans-unit.target: Góstna WLAN-seś, z kotrejuž sćo zwězany, se akciju pomina. Klikniśo how, aby VPN znjemóžnił, aby portal wiźeł.

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to may not be secure. Click here to turn on VPN to secure your device.
trans-unit.target: Góstna WLAN-seś, z kotrejuž sćo zwězany, snaź njejo wěsta. Klikniśo how, aby VPN zmóžnił, aby swój rěd zawěsćił.
